mapper.insert: insert into student_person (id, studentid, name, sex, birthday, birthpath, homepath, nation, headimg, dormitory,room, college, major, majorclass) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{birthpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dormitory,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{room,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{college,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{major,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{majorclass,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update student_person set studentid = #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, birthpath = #{birthpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, homepath = #{homepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headimg = #{headimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dormitory = #{dormitory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room = #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER}, college = #{college,jdbcType=INTEGER}, major = #{major,jdbcType=INTEGER}, majorclass = #{majorclass,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update student_person set studentid = #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, birthpath = #{birthpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, homepath = #{homepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headimg = #{headimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dormitory = #{dormitory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room = #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER}, college = #{college,jdbcType=INTEGER}, major = #{major,jdbcType=INTEGER}, majorclass = #{majorclass,jdbcType=INTEGER} where studentid = #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, studentid, name, sex, birthday, birthpath, homepath, nation, headimg, dormitory,room, college, major, majorclass from student_person where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
